attributes.review: this app is horrible, it took at least a week to download, and when it finally did, i was informed that i had a virus on my phone. then i do the smart thing and try to delete the app but it wouldn’t. i had to go to a phone store to get it removed. all of that hustle because of an app ironically from the president. the app played weird music and just made my phone go crazy, i had to spend an enormous amount of money, which i was saving up for donations to the homeless(which i do every year)but was wasted on this stupid app.

attributes.review: If I could I would give this app zero stars, it took a whole month for it to download. So when it finally was downloaded I went in the app, and it kicked me out and wouldn’t let me get back in. A week later it let me back in and said “Don’t vote for trump”. Needless to say this is the worst app.
